title: Potter versus 3D print designer, reflecting on us.
content:
[http://www.bbc.com/news/magazine-29941354](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414170110/http:/www.bbc.com/news/magazine-29941354 "http://www.bbc.com/news/magazine-29941354")  
I found the parallels to calligraphy versus type design quite revealing and enjoyable.

hhp
author: hrant

comments.content: Come to think of it, 3D printing could lead to a resurgence of block printing! ;-)

Hah, I did recently see a project where they 3D-printed large letterpress sorts!

hhp
